content: So those are the levers we'll keep to work, unlike Fritz said, I think we're in a position given where we exited December that our capacity in terms of labor and all feels pretty good for where we sit today and we brought a lot of it that we could in-house to make sure we keep our drivers as busy as we can and keep that valuable resource, because our outlook is still a little bit cloudy there's people starting to talk themselves in the idea that we're definitely going to have a soft landing now.
